Michael Miske.speaker: caller
Michael Miske.text: Hey Matt, you got a minute?

Michael Miske.speaker: caller
Michael Miske.text: Dude, people are SO bad at League of Legends. It's insane.

Michael Miske.speaker: caller
Michael Miske.text: Yeah and my teammates are absolute garbage. They don't know how to play at all.

Michael Miske.speaker: caller
Michael Miske.text: And then they keep making the same mistakes over and over. It's like they're not even trying.

Michael Miske.speaker: caller
Michael Miske.text: No way, I need to climb. But seriously, how do people get to this rank?

Michael Miske.speaker: player
Michael Miske.text: I don't know, practice I guess?

Michael Miske.speaker: caller
Michael Miske.text: Ugh, and Velli is terrible too. Like, why is he even playing?

Michael Miske.speaker: caller
Michael Miske.text: Yeah and he's awful. No idea what he's doing. Just feeds every game.

Michael Miske.speaker: player
Michael Miske.text: Okay, well good luck with your games.

Michael Miske.speaker: caller
Michael Miske.text: Thanks, I'll need it with these teammates.

Jar.speaker: caller
Jar.text: Matt! I need your help with something serious.

Jar.speaker: player
Jar.text: What's going on? Are you okay?

Jar.speaker: caller
Jar.text: It's about Fleece. He's... he's dead.

Jar.speaker: caller
Jar.text: We found him in his room. The scene is... disturbing.

Jar.speaker: player
Jar.text: Oh my god, that's terrible. Do they know what happened?

Jar.speaker: caller
Jar.text: That's the thing. The evidence points to something weird.

Jar.speaker: caller
Jar.text: There's a trampoline in his room. And... well, the coroner says he bounced on it too hard.

Jar.speaker: player
Jar.text: He bounced on it too hard? That's how he died?

Jar.speaker: caller
Jar.text: Yeah. Apparently he was bouncing and just... bounced too hard. It's a murder mystery now.

Jar.speaker: player
Jar.text: That's... that's really strange. I'm so sorry.

Jar.speaker: caller
Jar.text: Thanks. I just needed to tell someone. This is all so surreal.

Halle.speaker: caller
Halle.text: Hey Matt! I heard about the conference fundraising.

Halle.speaker: caller
Halle.text: Going well? Matt, you're doing AMAZING. Seriously impressive work.

Halle.speaker: player
Halle.text: Thanks! I've been putting in a lot of effort.

Halle.speaker: caller
Halle.text: I can tell. You're so good at this. Really, you're incredible.

Halle.speaker: player
Halle.text: Aw, that's really nice of you to say.

Halle.speaker: caller
Halle.text: I mean it. You're just... wow. So talented and dedicated.

Halle.speaker: caller
Halle.text: Maybe we could grab coffee sometime? I'd love to hear more about your work.

Halle.speaker: player
Halle.text: That sounds nice! I'll let you know when I'm free.

Halle.speaker: caller
Halle.text: Perfect! Can't wait. Keep up the amazing work!

Anne.speaker: caller
Anne.text: Hi Matt! I just wanted to call and say congratulations.

Anne.speaker: caller
Anne.text: The fundraising! Everyone's talking about how well you're doing.

Anne.speaker: caller
Anne.text: You're really something special, you know that? So organized and professional.

Anne.speaker: caller
Anne.text: I'm serious. You have this way of just... making things happen. It's really attractive.

Anne.speaker: caller
Anne.text: I'd love to work with you more. You're just so good at what you do.

Anne.speaker: caller
Anne.text: Great! Let's definitely make that happen. You're the best!
